author: 0xmerp
content: To publish via Tor why not do it where the validator sends a message as a one-off packet to other nodes, and propagate from there.

author: arnetheduck
content:
> The main issue with running via TOR
there's another issue: spam - currently, the gossip network is protected because we verify signatures - we can verify signatures because the messages are clear-text - without signature verification, we need a replacement mechanism (one such mechanism is RLN)
